member.summary: Gets the culture for a given .
member.param: The in which to get its culture.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.CultureAspect
member.summary: Represents a culture metadata for the content item.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.IContentLocalizationManager.GetItemsForSetAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get the list of items for the localizationSet
member.returns: List of all items matching a localizationSet

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.IContentLocalizationManager.GetContentItemAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the content item that matches the localizationSet / culture combination
member.returns: ContentItem or null if not found

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.IContentLocalizationManager.LocalizeAsync(OrchardCore.ContentManagement.ContentItem,System.String)
member.summary: Localizes the content item to the target culture. This method will clone the ContentItem of the default locale and set the culture of the LocalizationPart to the targetCulture.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.IContentLocalizationManager.DeduplicateContentItemsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{OrchardCore.ContentManagement.ContentItem})
member.summary: Deduplicate the list of contentItems to only keep a single contentItem per LocalizationSet. Each ContentItem is chosen with the following rules: - ContentItemId of the current culture for the set - OR ContentItemId of the default culture for the set - OR First ContentItemId found in the set

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.IContentLocalizationManager.GetFirstItemIdForSetsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Gets a list of ContentItemId for the LocalizationSet based on some rules Order of elements is kept.
member.returns: List of contentItemId, each chosen with the following rules: - ContentItemId of the current culture for the set - OR ContentItemId of the default culture for the set - OR First ContentItemId found in the set

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentLocalization.IContentLocalizationManager.GetItemsForSetsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Get the ContenItems that match the culture and localizationSet. A single ContentItem is returned per set if it exists.
